entries.recording_message_on: The next time you speak, it will be recorded by your merchant barker droid.
entries.recording_message_off: Recording mode has been turned off without saving.
entries.message_too_long: Your message is too long.  It cannot exceed 128 characters.  Please try again.
entries.message_saved: Your bark message has been saved.
entries.barking_on: The droid's merchant barking has been turned on.
entries.barking_off: The droid's merchant barking has been turned off.
entries.no_message_to_bark: You must record a message to bark.
entries.no_waypoints_in_datapad: You have no waypoints in your datapad from which to copy.
entries.barker_message_body: Here is your requested merchant waypoint.
entries.waypoint_sent: The droid's waypoint has been placed in your datapad.
entries.not_enough_power: The droid does not have enough power to do that.
entries.not_space_in_datapad: There is not enough space in your datapad for another waypoint.
entries.no_waypoint: This droid has no stored waypoint to give you.
entries.invalid_droid_bomb: You must target the droid you wish to detonate.
entries.must_be_owner_droid_bomb: You must be the master of the droid you wish to detonate.
entries.no_bomb_module: That droid has no detonation module.
entries.countdown_already_started: The detonation countdown has already started.
entries.insufficient_skill_detonate: You must be a Novice Bounty Hunter or a Novice Smuggler to detonate a droid.
entries.hit_by_detonation: You are caught in the blast of an exploding droid!  You take %DI damage!
entries.detonation_warmup: The droid needs to initialize its detonation module for the first time.  This will take approximately 10 seconds.
entries.no_stimpacks: You do not have any A level stimpacks to load into the droid.
entries.invalid_stimpack: That is not a valid stimpack.
entries.not_stimpack_droid: The droid you have selected does not have a stimpack dispensor module installed.
entries.stimpack_capacity_full: The droid's stimpack capacity is at its maximum.
entries.stimpack_loaded: The stimpack is loaded into the droid.
entries.stimpack_no_target: There are no nearby dispensor droids that are ready to deliver a stimpack.
entries.stimpack_not_ready: The droid is not yet ready to deliver another stimpack.
entries.stimpack_error: A malfunction is preventing the droid from dispensing stimpacks.
entries.stimpack_no_damage: You have no damage to heal.
entries.stimpack_cant_use_droid: To use a stimpack dispensor droid, you must either be its master on be in same group as its master.
entries.stimpack_supply_empty: The droid is out of stimpacks.
entries.stimpack_too_far_away: You are too far away from the droid to request a stimpack.
entries.no_available_effects: Your droid does not have any effects that it can perform.
entries.effect_error_reset: There is an error in your effects program.  Resetting the data.
entries.playback_list_prompt: Choose a track:  Record/Play -  - Record song data in an empty track - Playback song data in a recorded track  Delete - - Delete song data from a recorded track
entries.playback_delete_prompt: Are you sure you want to delete this track:
entries.playback_msg_rec_start: Your droid is ready to start recording your music.
entries.playback_msg_rec_timeout: Recording failed: You did not begin playing a song before the session timed out.
entries.playback_msg_rec_begun: Your droid has started to record your music.
entries.playback_msg_rec_fail_track_full: Recording failed: You cannot record over a track that is not empty.
entries.playback_msg_rec_fail_already_playing: Recording failed: You cannot record because you are already playing a song.
entries.playback_msg_rec_fail_not_finished: Recording failed: You stopped playing before the recording session was finished.
entries.playback_msg_rec_fail_corrupted: Recording failed: Inconsistant data, recording session corrupted.
entries.playback_msg_rec_complete: Your droid has successfully completed the recording session.
entries.playback_msg_del_track_already_empty: You cannot erase a track that is already empty.
entries.playback_msg_del_track_deleted: The song data has successfully been erased.
entries.playback_msg_play_out_of_power: Your droid is low on power and cannot access the track data.
entries.invalid_harvest_target: That is an invalid harvest target.
entries.already_harvested: You have already harvested that corpse.
entries.no_resources_to_harvest: There are no resources to harvest.
entries.corpse_too_far: The targeted corpse is too far away.
entries.set_interest_t: Select from the following list to set your droids target interest.  Default setting will be random.
entries.no_skill_for_effects: You must be at least a Novice Dancer or Novice Musician to do that.
entries.effects_started: You turn on the droid's effects.
entries.effects_off: You turn off the droid's effects.
entries.invalid_delay_time: The delay must be at least 3 seconds and no longer than 60 seconds.
entries.no_effects_program: The droid's effect program must have at least one active slot in order to active it.
entries.droid_maint_list_prompt: Please select a structure to perform a maintenance run on.   Once all structures to be maintained have been selected, press the Go button.
entries.droid_maint_amount_prompt: Please enter the amount of maintenance to pay on this structure.
entries.droid_maint_edit_prompt: Please select a structure to remove from this droid's maintenance list.
entries.droid_maint_empty_list: The maintenance list for this droid is empty.  Go to one of your structures and assign this droid to maintain it.
entries.droid_maint_no_valid_struct: There are no structures on the planet that this droid can maintain.  You must first travel to the planet the structure is on before performing a maintenance run.
entries.droid_maint_empty_maint_run: You must first add structures to be maintained before you can start a maintenance run.
entries.droid_maint_select_struct: You must first select a structure to add to the list for the maintenance run.
entries.droid_maint_data_error: Error retrieving structure data for maintenance run.
entries.droid_maint_invalid_amount: Invalid maintenance amount given, aborting maintenance run.
entries.droid_maint_not_enough_cash: You do not have enough money to perform that maintenance.
entries.droid_maint_cant_travel: You don't have enough money to pay the travel costs to maintain that structure.
entries.droid_maint_on_maint_run: You cannot call that droid.  It is currently on a maintenance run.
entries.droid_maint_diff_planet_suffix: cr additional charge to maintain that structure because it's on a different planet.
entries.already_loaded: This droid is already loaded with a trap.
entries.insufficient_skill: You have insufficient trapping skill to perform this action.
entries.target_too_far: That target is out of range.
entries.survey_planet_prompt: Choose a planet for the survey scan.
entries.survey_select_tool_prompt: Choose a survey tool to use for the scan.
entries.survey_no_survey_skill: You must have skill operating Survey Devices in order to properly program this droid.
entries.survey_no_survey_tools: No survey tools found in your inventory.  This droid requires a survey tool in order to perform its functions.
entries.droid_disabled_detonate: You cannot detonate a disabled droid.
entries.hit_by_detonation_master: %TT is caught in the blast of your exploding droid and hit for %DI damage.
entries.droid_harvest: Your droid has successfully harvested %DI unit(s) of %TU.
entries.trap_max_reached: The maximum trap load has been met.
entries.trap_matrix_full: The trap matrix is already full.
entries.invalid_trap_target: That is not a valid target.
entries.cant_throw_yet: Cannot fire another trap for %DI second(s).
entries.inventory_full: You have no room in your inventory for the Droid Memory Module.
entries.you_must_be_outdoors: You must be outdoors to launch this droid.
entries.survey_droid_launched: Survey Droid Launched: Estimated time to complete is %TT
entries.will_complete_maint_run: Your droid will complete the maintenance run in %TT.  It will be unavailable during that time.
entries.dance_prompt: Choose which droid you want to add the dance program to.
